metadata.title: W3Schools.com
metadata.Keywords: HTML, Python, CSS, SQL, JavaScript, How to, PHP, Java, C, C++, C#, jQuery, Bootstrap, Colors, W3.CSS, XML, MySQL, Icons, NodeJS, React, Graphics, Angular, R, AI, Git, Data Science, Code Game, Tutorials, Programming, Web Development, Training, Learning, Quiz, Exercises, Courses, Lessons, References, Examples, Learn to code, Source code, Demos, Tips, Website
metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.

content.text: Artificial Intelligence
Artificial Intelligence Is a Contrast to Human Intelligence
What is Artificial Intelligence?
Artificial Intelligence suggest that machines can mimic humans in:
content.html: Artificial Intelligence suggest that machines can mimic humans in:

content.text: Artificial Intelligence is also called Machine Intelligence and Computer Intelligence .
content.html: Artificial Intelligence is also called Machine Intelligence and Computer Intelligence.

content.text: Arthur Samuel 1959:
"Machine Learning is a subfield of computer science that gives computers the ability to learn without being programmed"
content.html: "Machine Learning is a subfield of computer science that gives computers the ability to learn without being programmed"

content.text: Arthur Samuel, IBM Journal of Research and Development, Vol. 3, 1959.
content.html: Arthur Samuel, IBM Journal of Research and Development, Vol. 3, 1959.

content.text: Wikipedia 2022:
Artificial intelligence is intelligence demonstrated by machines. Unlike natural intelligence displayed by humans and animals, which involves consciousness and emotionality.
content.html: Artificial intelligence is intelligence demonstrated by machines. Unlike natural intelligence displayed by humans and animals, which involves consciousness and emotionality.

content.text: Investopedia 2022:
Artificial intelligence refers to the simulation of human intelligence in machines that are programmed to think like humans and mimic their actions.
content.html: Artificial intelligence refers to the simulation of human intelligence in machines that are programmed to think like humans and mimic their actions.

content.text: Artificial intelligence leverages computers and machines to mimic the problem-solving and decision-making capabilities of the human mind.
content.html: Artificial intelligence leverages computers and machines to mimic the problem-solving and decision-making capabilities of the human mind.

content.text: Britannica 2022:

Artificial intelligence is the ability of a digital computer or computer-controlled robot to perform tasks commonly associated with intelligent beings, .... such as the ability to reason, discover meaning, generalize, or learn from past experience.
content.html: Artificial intelligence is the ability of a digital computer or computer-controlled robot to perform tasks commonly associated with intelligent beings, .... such as the ability to reason, discover meaning, generalize, or learn from past experience.

content.text: Artificial Intelligence (AI)
Artificial Intelligence is a scientific discipline embracing several Data Science fields ranging from narrow AI to strong AI, including machine learning, deep learning, big data and data mining.
content.html: Artificial Intelligence is a scientific discipline embracing several Data Science fields ranging from narrow AI to strong AI, including machine learning, deep learning, big data and data mining.

content.text: Narrow AI
Narrow Artificial Intelligence is limited to narrow (specific) areas like most of the AI we have around us today:
content.html: Narrow Artificial Intelligence is limited to narrow (specific) areas like most of the AI we have around us today:

content.text: Narrow AI is also called Weak AI .
Weak AI: Built to simulate human intelligence.
Strong AI: Built to copy human intelligence.
Strong AI
Strong Artificial Intelligence is the type of AI that mimics human intelligence.
content.html: Strong Artificial Intelligence is the type of AI that mimics human intelligence.

content.text: Strong AI indicates the ability to think, plan, learn, and communicate.
content.html: Strong AI indicates the ability to think, plan, learn, and communicate.

content.text: Strong AI is the theoretical next level of AI: True Intelligence .
content.html: Strong AI is the theoretical next level of AI: True Intelligence.

content.text: Strong AI moves towards machines with self-awareness, consciousness, and objective thoughts.
content.html: Strong AI moves towards machines with self-awareness, consciousness, and objective thoughts.

content.text: ✔ One need not decide if a machine can "think". One need only decide if a machine can act as intelligently as a human.
content.html:
✔ One need not decide if a machine can "think".
One need only decide if a machine can act as intelligently as a human.

content.text: Alan Turing
